Title: Royals and Loyals
Plot: The team hopes to avoid an international incident when an American officer is killed on a British ship.
ParentalRatingReason: R13 Violence and content that may disturb
GuestStars: Daniel Gillies, Kristen Ariza, Tracy Middendorf, John T. Woods, Peter Holden, Jamie Elman, Chris Jarvis, Ron Bottitta
